bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: John Maupin (1766-1840) was born in Albemarle County to William Gabriel Maupin and Mildred Mary White. John's first wife was Mary Michie. His second wife was Nancy Cobb nee Waddy. John Maupin died in 1840 and was buried in the Jarman-Maupin Cemetary in White Hall.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This is the last will and testament of John Maupin. The original is in fragile condition. Researchers must use the research copies of the document.
